meanings: (안을 밖으로) turn sth inside out, turn sth wrong side out
(위를 아래로) turn sth over[around], turn sth upside down
writhing in agony, 자반뒤집기하다 toss about (in sickness) , suffer from pain, writhe in agony
be as easy as flipping one's palm

vlive.korean: 막판 뒤집기 이런 거 없었어? Was there no comeback? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
[뒤집기 게임이 기다리고 있다!] 뒤집을 수가 있어요! we have a game remaining that can turn over the results. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “빅망진창 Mayday 합주회 ①” (빅톤 : VICTON)
vlive.english: we have a game remaining that can turn over the results.

vlive.korean: 그 운동회 때 그 뒤집기 아세요? 그 막 색깔 막 이렇게 - 뒤집기요? Do you know the flipping game? The game with the colors... - Flipping? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MCND X Rooftop Live - MCND의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Do you know the flipping game? The game with the colors... - Flipping?

vlive.korean: 너무 빨간색이 많다 - 뭔가 살짝 그거 같아, 운동회 때 그 뒤집기 아세요? There's too much red. - Do you know the flipping game on sports days at school? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] MCND X Rooftop Live - MCND의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: There's too much red. - Do you know the flipping game on sports days at school?

vlive.korean: 뒤집기... - 뒤집기를... Turned over... - Turn over... 듣기 View video VICTON : 다시 돌아온 빅토니 VLIVE💙💛

examples.korean: Our team overturned the game by scoring three runs at the bottom of the ninth. 발음듣기 우리 팀은 9회 말에 3점을 내면서 막판 뒤집기에 성공했다 Neungyule
examples.english: Our team overturned the game by scoring three runs at the bottom of the ninth. 발음

examples.korean: It would be hard to turn the game around at this point. 발음듣기 이제 승부를 뒤집기는 어렵다 Neungyule
examples.english: It would be hard to turn the game around at this point. 발음

examples.korean: However, we have done nothing to effectively reverse the trend. 발음듣기 그러나, 우리는 이 추세를 효과적으로 뒤집기 위해서 아무것도 하지 않았다. Neungyule
examples.english: However, we have done nothing to effectively reverse the trend. 발음

examples.korean: In order to reverse the situation, there needs to be a new social contract that can guarantee that those who have children are not severely disadvantaged in the workplace. 발음듣기 이런 상황을 뒤집기 위해서 아이들이 있는 사람들이 일터에서 손해를 보지 않도록 보장해줄 수 있는 새로운 사회적 계약이 있어야 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: In order to reverse the situation, there needs to be a new social contract that can guarantee that those who have children are not severely disadvantaged in the workplace. 발음

examples.korean: The intensity of the competition grew as the Chinese archers consistently brought upsets to the Korean score board with their near perfect shots. 발음듣기 중국선수들이 계속해서 완벽에 가까운 점수를 획득해 뒤집기를 반복함에 따라 대회는 한층 격렬해졌다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The intensity of the competition grew as the Chinese archers consistently brought upsets to the Korean score board with their near perfect shots. 발음
